Question
========
  
The figure below shows the distribution of the sample mean under two hypotheses is given. The critical limit for the resulting test is also drawn.

What can be concluded regarding the Type I error and power of the test in question?  

![](vufgb-nhst-006-nl-histogram01.jpg)
  
Answerlist
----------
* The probability of a Type I error is 95%, the power is 20%.
* The probability of a Type I error is 95%, the power is 80%.
* The probability of a Type I error is 5%, the power is 20%.
* The probability of a Type I error is 5%, the power is 80%.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
